book: Objective: Now go retrieve the Hydro-Spanner and fix the console on the Bridge!
Objective:Now go retrieve the key-card and insert in the Captain's chair on the Bridge
Objective:Now go fix the leaking chemical drum with the Lazer Welder in the Science Lab!
Objective:Now go retrieve the Space Vacuum and clean the dust in the Crew Quarters
Objective:Now go retrieve the bandaid and patch the coolant tubes in the cryo-room!
Objective:Now go retrieve the Artificially Intelligent Screwdriver and repair the Medical Kit
Objective:Now go retreive the Dilitheum Crystals and install in the Engine room
Objective:Now go repair the Oxygen Tanks with Duct Tape
Objective:Now go get the Trilitheum Crytals and install them in the Engine Room
